meanings.sent1: I can't believe the tarnations mess in the kitchen!
meanings.sent2: She was in a tarnations mood after losing the game.
meanings.sent3: Tarnations rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent4: The tarnations traffic made me late for work again.
meanings.sent5: The tarnations noise from the construction site was unbearable.

meanings.definition: Used as a mild oath or exclamation.
meanings.sent1: Tarnations! I forgot my keys at home.
meanings.sent2: Tarnations, that was a close call!
meanings.sent3: Tarnations, I can't believe I ate the whole cake.
meanings.sent4: Tarnations, the movie tickets are sold out.
meanings.sent5: Tarnations! Look at the size of that fish you caught!
